item.title: Azure DevOps yaml pipeline cheatsheet
item.description: A couple remarks Use a single pipeline for CI-CD, as there seems to be no way to connect BuildId (i.e., container version/tag to deploy) from CI pipeline to CD pipeline. The environment referenced in the deployment jobs are created if doesn’t exist The environment is where the approvals are configured, directly in Azure DevOps The pipeline is linked to a git repo in Azure DevOps as well. The pipeline is triggered when the master branch is pushed.
